definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: separate, explain, so Aram. [[פְּרַשׁ]] esp. Pa.; Syr. pra4 separate, distinguish, explain, cf. Mand., Nö:M 221);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Inf. cstr. ´[[לִפְרשׁ לָהֶם עַל־פִּי י]] Le 24:12 (P) to declare distinctly to them.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pt. [[נִפְרָשׁוֹת]] Ez Eze 34:12 read prob. [[שׂוֹת]]-, v. [[פרשׂ]].

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[פּׂרַשׁ]] Nu 15:34 (P) what should be done to him had not been distinctly declared; Pt. [[מְפׂרָשׁ]] Ne 8:8 made distinct (cf. B Aram Ezr 4:18), v. Be-Ry Kö:Einl. 99, > interpreted, Ke al., Berliner:T. Onk ii.74.
